Job DescriptionLocation/Division Specific InformationThis position will be based in Bangalore, India in the APAC Data and Automation team within Digital Solutions AsiaIn this role you will lead a team of Data Engineers, ETL developers and Power BI developers to build data solutions for the APJ region across a variety of platforms.  A creative, problem-solving approach and can-do demeanor that is continuously learning will lead to the success of the individual and team.Strong experience in data engineering, data transformation, big data and data visualizationAbility to lead and manage technical resourcesPassion to build data products and analytics to drive sustainable growth and productivityExperience in Agile framework and JiraEducationBachelor’s degree in Engineering, Statistics, Computer Science or related fieldsExperience8+ years demonstrated ability in Data Lake, Data Analytics & Business Intelligence Solutions2-4 years of working on Enterprise-level data engineering leveraging python, spark, Databricks,Informatica Power Center 9.x, 10.x, and Informatica Cloud environment.2+ years of experience in a DevOps environment, data integration, and pipeline development.2+ years of Experience with AWS Cloud on data integration with Apache Spark, EMR, Glue, Kafka, Kinesis, and Lambda in S3, Redshift, RDS, MongoDB/DynamoDB ecosystemsStrong real-life experience in python development especially in pySpark in AWS Cloud environment.Strong analytical experience with the database in writing complex queries, query optimization, debugging, user-defined functions, views, indexes, etc.Experience with source control systems such as Git, and Jenkins build and continuous integration tools.Knowledge of extract development against ERPs -
